divs: Sighting DetailsJust after new year, approx 12:05, my family and I saw a redish orange fireball in the sky. We all saw the same thing and tried for follow it, it was makeing a NW path in the sky approx airplane height movine in a NW direction. We saw clearly and Some trees obstructed view and it was gone. Could it be a chinese lantern? Was not ascending though.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Stuart
There were no other sightings in Stuart on or around January 1st 2013
Summary: My family and I saw red/orange fireball in sky just after 12AM. Observed fireball for about 4 mins and it disappeared. Straight NW line path.
